feed.title: Pedro Pessoa
feed.subtitle: I'm a python backend developer. Open to work and to contribute to open-source projects.

entry.title: Deploy Flask on AWS Elastic Beanstalk with the App Factory

link.title: Deploy Flask on AWS Elastic Beanstalk with the App Factory

entry.summary: Intro Hello! Here I’ll show you how to deploy a flask app that uses the app factory pattern on the AWS Elastic Beanstalk service. I assume that: You followed the official Flask Tutorial, which recommends the use of an app factory. You’ve already created an account in AWS. You were able to deploy the sample app on the official AWS Flask Deployment tutorial* * AWS EB Flask deploymen...

entry.title: Projects
entry.summary: Showcase Here I’ll put some projects that I’ve been working on. Python Point of Sale for Canteens video presentation live demo | source code | Pypos is a Point of Sale web application aimed to be easily implemented in a small scholar canteen with ease. The key features are cashless payment (a user credit system), basics and insightful financial reporting and offline support. Related T...
